tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE travel_itineraries (
    itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    itinerary_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    starting_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    destination_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    cultural_site VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_itineraries (
  itinerary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  itinerary_name TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  cultural_site_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE cultural_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  opening_hours TEXT,
  entry_fee DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE itinerary_schedule (
    itinerary_id INT,
    site_id INT,
    day INT NOT NULL,
    time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (itinerary_id) REFERENCES travel_itineraries(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES cultural_sites(id)
);

CREATE TABLE travel_itineraries (
    itinerary_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    itinerary_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    cultural_sites JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE travel_itineraries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE itinerary_cultural_sites (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    itinerary_id INT,
    cultural_site_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (itinerary_id) REFERENCES travel_itineraries(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cultural_site_id) REFERENCES cultural_sites(id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_itineraries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    itinerary_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (itinerary_id) REFERENCES travel_itineraries(id)
);
